Location & Access

Heaton Moor Golf Club is conveniently located in Heaton Mersey, Stockport, with easy access from the M60 motorway.

About the Club

Established in 1892, Heaton Moor Golf Club is a member-owned club offering championship golf in a beautiful parkland setting.
